title: Family Tour
review: Emperors listen from people there problems & complains. A place to see the mughal architecture and History.

title: Place for petitions
review: Where emperors had their audiences to hear from people petitions and complains. a good place to see the mughal architecture and beautiful details.

title: just another part of the fort
review: Interesting, but when you are surrounded by way more interesting places then it really doesn't stand out that much

title: A beautiful architectural structure built for Public Hearings
review: You can see and appreciate the building where Shahansha was giving audience to common citizens and addressing their complaints..

title: Mughal Royal Courtyard
review: It was over here that Mughal Emperors used to hold theirRoyal court. Commoners could approach the emperor over here, seeking justice and favors.

title: Still harmonious, must have been fantastic when painted in gold
review: Restored by Lord Curzon more than a hundred years ago. Originally the columns and ceilings were painted in gold and the plasterwork was also ornamented in gold and white shell lime.
